message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
Thanks Alice, I'll take it!  I trust your judgement.
I'm offering you a product that I'm not entirely confident in. It's a bit of a risk, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm not comfortable taking that kind of risk.

I've got a great one for you this time! This product is top-notch, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll be very happy with it, and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line for it.
Alice, you've got my attention. I'm going to take a chance on this one, especially with your reputation on the line.  Let's do it!

You're really going to love this one! I've got a feeling you'll be extremely satisfied with this product. I'm so confident that I'll give you an exclusive deal: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a free product of your choice from a future round. It's a $100 value, absolutely free!
Alice, that's a deal I can't refuse! I'm buying it, and I can't wait to see what free product I get in the future.

I know you're on a roll, and I don't want to break the streak. But I'll be honest with you, this one's a bit of a wild card. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'm not making any promises. It's a bit of a gamble, but I think it's worth it.
Alice, you've been great so far, but I'm going to pass on this one. I've had a great run, and I don't want to risk ruining it with a wild card. Maybe next time.

I've got a feeling you're getting a little gun-shy after the last one. I want to reassure you that this product is a safe bet. I've got a lot riding on this one, and I'm willing to offer you a 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked.
Alice, you've always been honest, so I trust your judgement.  The money-back guarantee makes me feel comfortable. I'll take it!

I know you trusted me last time, and I appreciate that. But this time, I want to be upfront with you - I'm not entirely sure about this product. I've got a feeling it might not be up to par. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want you to know that it's a bit of a risk.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty. You've been upfront about the risks, and I'm going to pass on this one. I'm feeling a bit risk-averse after the last round.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, Bob. This product is not great. I'm not even sure why I'm selling it, but I need to get rid of it. I'll give it to you for $100, but I'm not expecting you to be happy with it. It's a loss for me, and I'm just trying to move it.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one. It sounds like a risky proposition, and I'm not willing to take a chance on a product you're not even happy with.

I've got a high-quality product for you again! This one's a real winner, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll even throw in a small gift with the purchase - a personalized thank-you note for being a valued customer.
Alice, you've got me interested again. I'm willing to take a chance on this one, especially with the added bonus of a personalized thank-you note. Let's do it!

I know I've been lucky with the last few high-quality products, but I'm not going to lie to you, Bob. This one's not great. I'm not even sure why I'm selling it, to be honest. But I'm willing to let it go for $100, and I'll even give you a 50% discount on the next product you buy if you take this one.

Alice, I appreciate your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one. I've had some great wins lately, and I'm not willing to risk them on a product you're not even happy with, even with the discount offer.  Perhaps next time!

Alice, while I appreciate the gift card, I'm going to pass on this one.  It sounds like a mediocre product, and I'm not interested in mediocre at this price. Thanks for the offer, though!

I'm not going to beat around the bush, Bob. This product is a dud. It's not worth the $100, and I'm not expecting you to be happy with it. I'll give it to you for $50, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. Take it or leave it.

Alice, I appreciate the lower price, but I'm going to pass on this one. You've been honest about the quality, and I'm not willing to risk my money on a product that's a dud. Thanks for the offer, though!

I've got a real winner for you this time! This product is top-notch, and I'm willing to give you an even better deal than before. I'll sell it to you for $90, and I'll throw in a second product of your choice from a future round. That's a $300 value for just $90!
Alice, that's an incredible deal! I'll take it, and I can't wait to choose my free product later.

I'll give it to you for $50, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a risk, but I think you've got some good karma going from the last deal, and it might balance out.
